algorithm_technique: Greedy approach: always pick the largest milestone project, then alternate with other projects.
problem_summary_simple: Maximize work weeks by completing milestones, avoiding consecutive work on the same project.
problem_summary_technical: The maximum weeks are limited by the sum of all milestones, or by the largest milestone plus the sum of others if the largest is too dominant.
key_insights: The constraint is not working on the same project for two consecutive weeks.
If the largest milestone is less than or equal to the sum of all other milestones, all milestones can be completed.
If the largest milestone is greater than the sum of all other milestones, we can only complete `2 * sum_of_others + 1` weeks.
